title: How to Clear Google Play Store History

steps.title: Launch the Google Play Store.
steps.content: Launch the Google Play Store. On your Android home screen, tap the Google Play store icon.

steps.title: Open the Play Store Menu.
steps.content: Open the Play Store Menu. Tap on your profile icon at the top-right corner. The menu panel will pop up on your screen

steps.title: Tap on the “Settings” option.
steps.content: Tap on the “Settings” option. It will be the second last option in the menu panel. This will leads you to the settings page.

steps.title: Tap on “General”.
steps.content: Tap on “General”. Some options will show up under the “General” title when you do so.

steps.title: Tap on the “Account and device preferences” option.
steps.content: Tap on the “Account and device preferences” option. It's the first option in general settings.

steps.title: Clear the search history.
steps.content: Clear the search history. Scroll down to the “History” section and tap the “Clear device history” option.

steps.title: Confirm your action.
steps.content: Confirm your action. Tap on Clear history option to continue. This will now remove all previous searches within the Google Play Store. That's all!
